tasks.title: MVP Project Setup
tasks.description: Set up basic Next.js project with minimal dependencies for MVP
tasks.details:
- Initialize Next.js 14 with TypeScript
- Set up Tailwind CSS for styling
- Configure basic ESLint
- Set up Git repository
- Create basic folder structure
- Set up environment variables for development

tasks.title: MVP Design and Layout
tasks.description: Create simple, clean design system and basic layouts for MVP pages
tasks.details:
- Define basic color scheme and typography
- Create simple component library (header, footer, buttons, cards)
- Design responsive layouts for mobile and desktop
- Create basic wireframes for all pages
- Focus on clean, professional appearance
- Ensure accessibility basics

tasks.title: Static Website Pages
tasks.description: Build all essential website pages with static content
tasks.details:
- Home page with hero section and basic info
- About page with club information
- Membership page with types and contact info
- Facilities page with golf course details
- Contact page with location and hours
- Simple navigation and footer
- Basic SEO meta tags

tasks.title: Simple Contact and Inquiry Forms
tasks.description: Create basic contact forms that email club staff directly
tasks.details:
- Contact form that sends emails to club staff
- Membership inquiry form
- Event inquiry form
- Simple form validation
- Email notifications to staff
- No complex backend - just email forwarding
- Use simple email service (Resend or similar)

tasks.title: Basic Content Management
tasks.description: Simple file-based or minimal CMS for basic content updates
tasks.details:
- Simple admin interface for basic content updates
- Text content editing for main pages
- Image upload and management
- News/announcements section
- Document upload for rules, brochures
- Basic user authentication for admin
- File-based storage initially

tasks.title: Simple Booking System (Manual)
tasks.description: Create booking inquiry system that emails staff for manual processing
tasks.details:
- Tee time inquiry form with date/time selection
- Event booking inquiry form
- Form sends detailed email to staff
- Staff manually processes bookings
- No real-time availability checking
- Simple confirmation emails
- No payment integration initially

tasks.title: MVP Testing and Optimization
tasks.description: Basic testing and performance optimization for MVP launch
tasks.details:
- Cross-browser testing (Chrome, Safari, Firefox)
- Mobile responsiveness testing
- Basic performance optimization
- Image optimization
- Form functionality testing
- Basic security measures
- SEO optimization

tasks.title: MVP Deployment and Launch
tasks.description: Deploy MVP to production and prepare for launch
tasks.details:
- Deploy to Vercel or similar platform
- Set up custom domain
- Configure SSL certificate
- Set up basic monitoring
- Create launch checklist
- Prepare staff training materials
- Document basic maintenance procedures
